arg.line: -source-path ${openzoom.src}
-doc-sources ${openzoom.src}/OpenZoomSDK.as
-library-path ${openzoom.lib}
-library-path ${flex_sdk.dir}/frameworks/libs/
-package org.openzoom.flash.components "The org.openzoom.flash.components package contains the OpenZoom components for Flash."
-package org.openzoom.flash.descriptors "The org.openzoom.flash.descriptors package contains the OpenZoom descriptor classes and base classes for custom descriptors."
-package org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.deepzoom "The org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.deepzoom package contains the descriptor classes for the Microsoft Deep Zoom image and collection file format."
-package org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.djatoka "The org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.djatoka pacakge contains the descriptor class for the aDORe djatoka JPEG 2000 image server."
-package org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.gigapan "The org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.gigapan package contains the descriptor class for the GigaPan.org project."
-package org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.openstreetmap "The org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.openstreetmap package contains the descriptor class for the OpenStreetMap.org project."
-package org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.openzoom "The org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.openzoom package contains the descriptor class for the OpenZoom Description Format."
-package org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.rosettaproject "The org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.rosettaproject package contains the descriptor class for the Rosetta Project."
-package org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.virtualearth "The org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.virtualearth package contains the descriptor class for Microsoft Virtual Earth."
-package org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.zoomify "The org.openzoom.flash.descriptors.zoomify package contains the descriptor class for the Zoomify file format."
-package org.openzoom.flash.events "The org.openzoom.flash.events package contains the classes that define OpenZoom events."
-package org.openzoom.flash.renderers "The org.openzoom.flash.renderers package contains OpenZoom renderer classes."
-package org.openzoom.flash.scene "The org.openzoom.flash.scene package contains the scene classes."
-package org.openzoom.flash.utils "The org.openzoom.flash.utils package contains the utility classes and interfaces, such as data structures like Cache."
-package org.openzoom.flash.utils.math "The org.openzoom.flash.utils.math package contains the mathematical utility classes."
-package org.openzoom.flash.utils.uri "The org.openzoom.flash.utils.uri package contains the utility classes for handling URI."
-package org.openzoom.flash.viewport "The org.openzoom.flash.viewport package contains the viewport classes."
-package org.openzoom.flash.viewport.constraints "The org.openzoom.flash.viewport.constraints package contains the viewport constraint classes."
-package org.openzoom.flash.viewport.controllers "The org.openzoom.flash.viewport.controllers package contains the viewport controller classes."
-package org.openzoom.flash.viewport.transformers "The org.openzoom.flash.viewport.transformers package contains the viewport transformer classes."
-package org.openzoom.flex.components "The org.openzoom.flex.components package contains the OpenZoom components for Flex."
-window-title "OpenZoom SDK ${openzoom.version}"
-templates-path ${openzoom.doc}/templates
-output ${openzoom.doc.out}
-source-path ${openzoom.src}
-library-path ${openzoom.lib}
-library-path ${flex_sdk.dir}/frameworks/libs/
-library-path ${flex_sdk.dir}/frameworks/locale/en_US
-namespace http://ns.openzoom.org/sdk/2009 manifest.xml
-include-namespaces http://ns.openzoom.org/sdk/2009
-output ${openzoom.swc.out}/openzoom.swc
